<<<<<<< HEAD
To the Parliament, the Army, and all the wel-affected in the nation, who have been faithful to the good old cause. Penington, Isaac, 1616-1679.
[4] p.
printed by J.M. for Giles Calvert, at the Black-Spread-Eagle near the west end of Pauls, [London : 1659]
Signed at end: Isaac Penington the younger. Caption title. Imprint from colophon. Signatures: A² . Annotation on Thomason copy: "May 20 1659". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
